answers.author: Roderick Wood
answers.text:
As City Manager I did, as far as we know the first successful base conversion in the US - Hamilton Army Air Field Novato California. It involved four separate base closures under three separate base closure acts involving GSA , Army, Air Force, Navy and Coast guard.  It resulted in approximately 15 pieces of Federal legislation resolving state and Fedral conflicts and 12 pieces of State legislation, 11 law suits and six ballot initiatives.  Happy to chat with you, my contact info is in ICMA who's who.

answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Heather - you may want to call the City of Concord, CA (925 671-3000) as they are about 2-years into redeveloping Port Chicago military base.  
Good luck,

author: Heather Worthington
text: If you have completed a GSA-led land transfer of military-owned land, and started redevelopment of that land, I would like to talk to you about your process and any consultants you have used.  Please reply and I will contact you with specific questions.  Thanks!
title: GSA Land Transfers and Redevelopment
